comments: Traces of successive powers of pentanacci matrix. - _Artur Jasinski_, Jan 05 2007
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..199
Martin Burtscher, Igor Szczyrba, Rafa≈Ç Szczyrba, Analytic Representations of the n-anacci Constants and Generalizations Thereof, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 18 (2015), Article 15.4.5.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Lucas n-Step Number
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,1,1,1)
formula: a(n) = n * sum(k=1..n, 1/k*sum(r=0..k, binomial(k,r)*sum(m=0..r, binomial(r,m) * sum(j=0..m, binomial(m,j)*binomial(j,n-m-k-j-r))))), n>0. [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 22 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
